programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A Civil War soldier develops a relationship with a band of Lakota Indians. Attracted by the simplicity of their lifestyle, he chooses to leave his former life behind to be with them. Having observed him, they give the name Dances With Wolves. Soon he is a welcomed member of the tribe and falls in love with a white woman who has been raised in the tribe. Tragedy results when Union soldiers arrive with designs on the land.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: Handsome pharmaceutical salesman Jamie Randall (Jake Gyllenhaal) always has good luck with women. A chance encounter with Maggie Murdock (Anne Hathaway), a free-spirited Parkinson's patient, leads to a sexual relationship. As Jamie and Maggie become closer, each must question if a serious commitment is in their future.

programme.title: Better Off Dead
programme.desc: Lane Meyer (John Cusack) is a teen with a peculiar family and a bizarre fixation with his girlfriend, Beth (Amanda Wyss). When Beth dumps Lane, he decides to kill himself, making bumbling attempts at suicide. Outside of his morbid endeavors, Lane spends time with his oddball buddy, Charles (Curtis Armstrong), and befriends Monique (Diane Franklin), a visiting French student. Eventually, Lane resolves to race Beth's obnoxious new beau on the ski slopes, with unexpected results.

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: With her graduation from law school imminent, Veronica Mars is interviewing with prestigious New York law firms when she gets a call from ex-boyfriend Logan, who has been accused of murder. Veronica returns to Neptune to help Logan find a good defense attorney, but when she becomes suspicious of the way Logan's case is being handled, she finds herself being pulled back into a life she thought she had left behind: that of an amateur sleuth.

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) is a Miami mobster who gets sent by his boss, the psychopathic Bones Barboni (Dennis Farina), to collect a bad debt from Harry Zimm (Gene Hackman), a Hollywood producer who specializes in cheesy horror films. When Chili meets Harry's leading lady (Rene Russo), the romantic sparks fly. After pitching his own life story as a movie idea, Chili learns that being a mobster and being a Hollywood producer really aren't all that different.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: In an alternate 1985 America, costumed superheroes are part of everyday life. When one of his former comrades is murdered, masked vigilante Rorschach (Jackie Earle Haley) uncovers a plot to kill and discredit all past and present superheroes. As he reconnects with his retired associates, only one of which has true powers, Rorschach glimpses a far-reaching conspiracy involving their shared past and catastrophic consequences for the world's future.

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld while her son discovers an underwater town.

programme.title: Death of a Unicorn
programme.desc: A weekend retreat has deadly consequences when a father and daughter accidentally hit and kill a unicorn while en route to find his billionaire boss, who seeks to exploit the creature's miraculous curative properties.

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: Living under cover in Brazil, master assassin Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) springs back into action after an old enemy (Sam Hazeldine) kidnaps the woman (Jessica Alba) he loves. To save her life, Bishop must kill an imprisoned African warlord, a human trafficker (Toby Eddington) and an arms dealer (Tommy Lee Jones), all while making the deaths look like accidents. When things don't go exactly as planned, Bishop turns the tables on the people who forced him out of retirement.

programme.title: Warfare
programme.desc: The harrowing true story of a U.S. Navy SEAL platoon surveillance mission gone dangerously wrong.

programme.title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
programme.desc: This installment marks the return of the seemingly indestructible masked murderer Michael Myers (George P. Wilbur), who is targeting Tommy Doyle (Paul Stephen Rudd), a young man tied into the legacy of the killer and his connections with the Strode family. As the supernatural elements of Michael's macabre abilities are explored, his longtime adversary, Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence), is also back in yet another attempt to stop the psychopath's brutal rampages.

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: Two decades after surviving a massacre on October 31, 1978, former baby sitter Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis) finds herself hunted by persistent knife-wielder Michael Myers. Laurie now lives in Northern California under an assumed name, where she works as the headmistress of a private school. But it's not far enough to escape Myers, who soon discovers her whereabouts. As Halloween descends upon Laurie's peaceful community, a feeling of dread weighs upon her -- with good reason.

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: He's back for more... When a group of teens win a contest to spend a night in Michael Myers' childhood home to be broadcast live on the Internet, they believe they are in for a little fun and some free publicity. But things go frightfully wrong and the game turns into a struggle to make it out of the house alive.

programme.title: The Substance
programme.desc: Fading actress Elisabeth Sparkle becomes distressed when her chauvinistic boss fires her from her aerobics show. She soon injects herself with a mysterious serum that promises a younger, better version of herself, but things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: A group of New York City psychics conducts deeply intimate readings for their clients, revealing a kaleidoscope of loneliness, connection and healing.

programme.title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
programme.desc: In a prison cell somewhere in Latin America, two very different men warily confront each other. Molina (William Hurt) is first seen wrapping his head in a towel, in the shape of a turban, while Valentin (Raul Julia), bearded and classically macho in appearance, watches with a mixture of fascination and revulsion. During the time spent together, the two men come to understand and respect each other.

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Some British retirees (Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Bill Nighy) decide to outsource their retirement to exotic -- and less expensive -- India. Lured by advertisements for the newly restored Marigold Hotel and imagining a life of leisure in lush surroundings, they arrive and find that the Marigold is actually a shell of its former self. Though their new home is not quite what they had imagined, the retirees find that life and love can begin again when they let go of their pasts.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway with Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Alabama Solution
programme.desc: In 2019, whispers from Alabama inmates spark a six-year probe into a prison system, exposing hidden brutality, corruption and a fight for truth and survival.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges plays Jeff Lebowski who insists on being called "the Dude," a laid-back, easygoing burnout who happens to have the same name as a millionaire whose wife owes a lot of dangerous people a whole bunch of money -- resulting in the Dude having his rug soiled, sending him spiraling into the Los Angeles underworld.

programme.title: Practical Magic
programme.desc: Sally and Gillian Owens, born into a magical family, have mostly avoided witchcraft themselves. But when Gillian's vicious boyfriend, Jimmy Angelov, dies unexpectedly, the Owens sisters give themselves a crash course in hard magic. With policeman Gary Hallet growing suspicious, the girls struggle to resurrect Angelov -- and unwittingly inject his corpse with an evil spirit that threatens to end their family line.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: Ally Darling (Anna Faris) is realizing she's a little lost in life. Her latest romance has just fizzled out, and she's just been fired from her marketing job. Then she reads an eye-opening magazine article that warns that 96 percent of women who've been with 20 or more lovers are unlikely to find a husband. Determined to turn her life around and prove the article wrong, Ally embarks on a mission to find the perfect mate from among her numerous ex-boyfriends.

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: A reclusive English teacher, living alone in the wake of a tragedy, attempts to reconnect with his teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption.

programme.title: Queer
programme.desc: Lee, a solitary American in Mexico City, falls for a beautiful, elusive former soldier. Journeying together into the jungle, Lee sees, for the first time, the possibility of an intimate and infinite love.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect arrives in America to rebuild his life. On his own in a strange new country, a wealthy industrialist recognizes his talent -- but power and legacy comes at a heavy cost.

programme.title: Chronicle
programme.desc: Andrew (Dane DeHaan) is a socially awkward, introverted teen whose main form of escape and expression is a video camera. But things begin to change when Andrew, his cousin Matt (Alex Russell) and popular classmate Steve (Michael B. Jordan) discover a mysterious substance that leaves them with incredible powers. As their abilities become more powerful, the teens' lives spin out of control when their darker sides begin to emerge. Andrew's camera captures the unfolding events.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) becomes winter caretaker at the isolated Overlook Hotel in Colorado, hoping to cure his writer's block. He settles in along with his wife, Wendy (Shelley Duvall), and his son, Danny (Danny Lloyd), who is plagued by psychic premonitions. As Jack's writing goes nowhere and Danny's visions become more disturbing, Jack discovers the hotel's dark secrets and begins to unravel into a homicidal maniac hell-bent on terrorizing his family.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: In an alternate 1980s, the United States stands alone as communism grows stronger. When Soviet soldiers invade a small Colorado town, brothers Jed (Patrick Swayze) and Matt Eckert (Charlie Sheen) escape with friends to the forest. With their father, Tom (Harry Dean Stanton), a prisoner of the invading army, the children decide to fight against the Soviets. As the country comes under increasing attack, the group teams up with Lt. Col. Andrew Tanner (Powers Boothe) to take back their town.

programme.title: An Intimate Evening With Adam Pally
programme.desc: Equal parts stand-up, documentary and rock concert, Adam Pally plays with the truth and his guitar in a one-time-only performance.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Nick Morton is a soldier of fortune who plunders ancient sites for timeless artifacts and sells them to the highest bidder. When Nick and his partner come under attack in the Middle East, the ensuing battle accidentally unearths Ahmanet, a betrayed Egyptian princess who was entombed under the desert for thousands of years. With her powers constantly evolving, Morton must now stop the resurrected monster as she embarks on a furious rampage through the streets of London.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Forced back into the field after a family tragedy, special agent Tom Brandis leads a new task force investigating a string of robberies.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom's family prepares for an emotional court date; Robbie faces a dilemma; Maeve makes a crucial decision that might change everything.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Cliff and Robbie look for a buyer, Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches' former co-workers; Tom and Grasso pursue a lead.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom questions the loyalty of his taskforce; Perry probes his own gang for answers and uncovers a shocking truth.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case; Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion; later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: When Superman gets drawn into conflicts at home and abroad, his actions are questioned, giving tech billionaire Lex Luthor the opportunity to get the Man of Steel out of the way for good. Will intrepid reporter Lois Lane and Superman's four-legged companion, Krypto, be able to help him before it's too late?

programme.desc: Wildlife series. Jeremy Wade investigates the ferocious and carnivorous tigerfish.

programme.title: Canadian Horror
programme.desc: The hunt for a 20-foot lake monster that attacks humans in Canada's wilderness.

programme.title: Colombian Slasher
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade heads to Colombia to investigate a creature blamed for killing a new bride.

programme.title: Killer Torpedo
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade ventures deep into Central America in search of a killer fish.

programme.title: Man-Eating Monster
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade embarks on a mission in Guyana in South America.

programme.title: Jungle Terminator
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates three mysterious deaths in the remote western Amazon.

programme.title: Killers from the Abyss (Part 1)
programme.desc: Fishing detective, Jeremy Wade, takes on the biggest investigation of his career.

programme.title: Secrets of the Sea
programme.desc: Jeremy goes behind the scenes and we see what went into the making of a season at sea.

programme.title: European Maneater
programme.desc: Biologist and extreme angler Jeremy Wade investigates tales of a man-eating catfish.

programme.title: Silent Assassin
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade travels to the Parana River in Argentina.

programme.title: Demon Fish
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade journeys up the Congo River in search of the ferocious Goliath Tiger Fish.

programme.title: The Mutilator
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade travels to Papua New Guinea.

programme.title: American Killer Catfish
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade visits tourist hotspots in the USA in search of river monsters.

programme.title: Invisible Executioner
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade travels to the Zambezi River in Africa.

programme.title: Phantom Assassin
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade returns to Australia's Fitzroy River on his toughest quest yet.

programme.title: Killer Catfish
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for the notorious killer catfish.

programme.title: Vampires of the Deep
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade embarks on a punishing mission to the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: Mongolian Mauler
programme.desc: In Mongolia, Jeremy Wade investigates a rare giant fish.

programme.title: Coral Reef Killer
programme.desc: A mysterious sea creature impales victims on the island of Sulawesi in Indonesia.

programme.title: Killer Snakehead
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates whether the snakehead deserves its fearsome reputation.

programme.title: Legend of Loch Ness
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is on a mission to track down the famous Loch Ness monster.

programme.title: Chainsaw Predator
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is in the Australian outback trying to catch the rare freshwater sawfish.

programme.title: Electric Executioner
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is in Brazil in search of a fish that has already killed three cowboys.

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem?

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: Forever In My Heart
programme.desc: Jenna and Charlie found love in Ireland but their dreams drove them apart. Five years later, they reunite and Jenna has to decide where her heart belongs—back home or in the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: Calling for Love
programme.desc: When successful podcaster Samantha Desouza is re-assigned to host Heartwaves, a feel-good love song show with a segment that reunites lost loves, she is less than impressed – love isn't her favourite topic right now.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Love
programme.desc: Emma has a lifestyle website that she puts her heart and soul into called “Classically Emma”. But when her numbers start trending down, she thinks she might've found her fix in a partnership with an ambitious millennial named Jill who has her own dreams.

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Celebrated and adored by millions, she was the Queen of people's hearts, yet the bittersweet story of the last man to truly capture hers has never before. In a story that until now has remained untold, Diana introduces a time in the Princess's life that was important in shaping her final years...

programme.title: Lust For Love
programme.desc: Astor's happy tenacity spoils his one chance at love with his lifelong crush Mila. Convinced he needs more experience with women to win her back, he engages her ex-best friend Cali to teach him how to woo women.

programme.title: Can You Keep A Secret?
programme.desc: On a return flight from a botched client meeting, Emma reveals all of her deepest secrets to a handsome stranger when her plane hits turbulence and she believes she is going to die. Emma thinks she will never see the guy again.

programme.title: The Big Wedding
programme.desc: With an all-star cast led by Robert DeNiro, Katherine Heigl, Diane Keaton, Amanda Seyfried with Susan Sarandon and Robin Williams, THE BIG WEDDING is an romantic comedy about a charmingly modern family trying to survive a weekend wedding celebration that has the potential to become a family fiasco.

programme.title: Anything Else
programme.desc: Jerry Falk (Jason Biggs), a young writer in New York City, leaves his girlfriend for free-spirited Amanda (Christina Ricci). Seeking advice, Jerry turns to an older, struggling artist who helps him deal with his messy love life.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: The perfect world of a beautiful Seattle television reporter is shattered by the prediction of her death in seven days.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: Miracles: The Canton Godfather
programme.desc: A country boy becomes the head of a gang through the purchase of some lucky roses from an old lady. He and a singer at the gang's nightclub try to do a good deed for the old lady when her daughter comes to visit.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Instrument Of War is an harrowing yet uplifting true story about survival against seemingly impossible odds. When U.S. B-24 bomber pilot Clair Cline is shot down and captured in northern Germany, one war ends and another begins -- to keep hope alive.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer Aimes is just your average, undercover, super-assassin accustomed to a life of flashy sports cars and even flashier women. But when he meets Jen Kornfeldt, a fun-loving computer tech, he finds true love… and happily trades international intrigue for domestic bliss.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: American born Casey has dedicated his life to studying the ancient art of Ninjutsu in Japan. Casey's training is put to the test when his Sensei asks him to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

programme.title: Son of a Gun
programme.desc: JR busts out of prison with Brendan Lynch, Australia's most notorious criminal, and joins Lynch's gang for a gold heist that soon pits the two men against one another.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Set in 1903, Tracker is a tense action thriller in which Arjan (Ray Winstone), a guerrilla survivor of the South African Boer War, lands in colonial New Zealand and is promised a huge bounty to capture Kereama (Temuera Morrison), a Maori seafarer accused of killing a British soldier.

programme.title: The Last Legion
programme.desc: As the Roman empire collapses, young Romulus Augustus must leave the city and set out for a dangerous journey to Britain to locate his last legion of supporters.

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: When the wedding of super star Lara Tyler (Alice Eve - Bombshell) to tweedy English author James Arber (David Tennant – Doctor Who) is sabotaged by paparazzi, they decide to relocate the event to the one place where the world's press won't find them.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig stars as Imogene, once a promising young New York playwright whose promise has fizzled, thanks to a crisis of confidence. Heavily in denial about being dumped by her society boyfriend, Imogene uses her skill for drama to stage an elaborate fake suicide as an appeal for his sympathy.

programme.title: Dan In Real Life
programme.desc: In this down-to-earth dramedy, a widowed advice columnist and single father (Steve Carell) falls in love with a woman (Juliette Binoche) only to discover she is dating his brother.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Big Momma is back — and this time he has big backup: his teenage stepson Trent (Brendan T. Jackson). Martin Lawrence returns as FBI agent Malcolm Turner and as Turner's deep-cover alter-ego Big Momma.

programme.title: Welcome to Me
programme.desc: Welcome to Me is about a year in the life of Alice Klieg (Kristen Wiig), a woman with Borderline Personality Disorder who wins Megamillions, quits her meds and buys herself a TV show where she talks only, and exclusively, about herself.

programme.title: First Date
programme.desc: After being conned into buying a shady '65 Chrysler, Mike's first date plans with girl-next-door Kelsey implode as he finds himself targeted by criminals, cops, and a crazy cat lady.

programme.title: Ceremony
programme.desc: Entertaining romantic comedy about a young man who crashes the wedding of an older woman (Uma Thurman) he still loves.

programme.title: The Legend of Barney Thomson
programme.desc: Comedy drama as Robert Carlyle plays Barney Thomson, a downtrodden barber who has fallen from grace in his meagre barbering life. One day whilst almost losing his job, Barney comically falls into the unthinkable role of a serial killer.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Ray is a fussy nine-year-old girl whose last nanny just ran out. When Ray's way-too-busy mom hires Molly to be Ray's new nanny, it's the perfect setup for both girls to change their ways and discover that sometimes your best friend can come in the form that you least expect!

programme.title: All I Want For Christmas
programme.desc: (2013) Festive romance with Melissa Sagemiller. All Elizabeth wants for Christmas is a promotion. Can a magical gift from Santa's helper lend a hand, not just in work, but in love and life too?

programme.title: The Santa Squad

programme.title: Fixing Up Christmas
programme.desc: (2021) Deck the halls with Natalie Dreyfuss. When a workaholic executive hires a festive fixer for his family's company Christmas party, sparks fly, ornaments drop and love comes down the chimney.

programme.title: Click and Collect
programme.desc: (2018) Comic caper with Stephen Merchant. Mismatched neighbours Andrew and Dev go on a reluctant cross-country road trip to buy a sparkly and elusive Christmas present for Andrew's young daughter.

programme.title: Twinkle All The Way
programme.desc: (2019) Festive romance with Sarah Drew. Two single parents find themselves growing closer as they juggle a wedding and a VIP Christmas Eve party, discovering love in unexpected places.

programme.title: Christmas by The Book
programme.desc: A bestselling writer is dispatched by a TV talk show to a rural town where she is given two weeks to re-create the magical childhood Christmas described in her book. Starring Lindy Booth (2022)

programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: (2014) Tail-wagging romance with Chandra West. After a single mum's puppy gets lost and is adopted by a single dad, they argue over who gets to keep him. Will they realise love is a four-legged word?

programme.title: A Very Country Christmas
programme.desc: (2017) Festive romance with Greyston Holt. A singer escapes the chaos of Hollywood to rediscover his love for country music. But what he stumbles upon is even better.

programme.title: Click and Collect
programme.desc: (2018) Comic caper with Stephen Merchant. Mismatched neighbours Andrew and Dev go on a reluctant cross-country road trip to buy a sparkly and elusive Christmas present for Andrew's young daughter.

programme.title: Christmas Cookies
programme.desc: (2016) Freshly baked romance with Jill Wagner. An executive is sent to shut down a small-town cookie business, but finds herself up against a handsome factory owner who is determined to keep going.

programme.title: Christmas Romance Al Dente
programme.desc: (2020) Delicious Christmas romance with Anni Krueger. When her cousin has to cancel her restaurant's opening, Natalie vows to make it happen any way she can - even if the chef thinks it's impossible..

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released on board an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army, but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong, a bounty is placed on his head.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, is the last Gunslinger standing. He has a grave responsibility, it is up to him to prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Man of Steel

programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agency's name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481 BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthor's latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige discovers her new boss has swapped his soul for a successful career; Wyatt sabotages Piper's dates; Chris and Leo travel back in time.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When the Lady of the Lake appears before the Charmed Ones and pleads for help to protect the legendary Sword in the Stone, Piper comes forward and pulls the sword free.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After vanquishing a Manticore demon, the sisters become foster parents to its orphaned baby; Phoebe surprises her boyfriend by blurting out her true feelings.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A mysterious woman from the future (Marisol Nichols) arrives to take Chris' powers; the Power of Three is endangered when Paige moves in with Richard and Phoebe joins Jason in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige tries on a pair of Grams' go-go boots and goes back in time; Leo and Chris try to stave off an amorphous creature surrounding the manor.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige and Phoebe conjure up Mr. Right as a birthday present for Piper; Chris convinces the sisters to bind Wyatt's powers, then demonic cult members kidnap the youngster.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe's boyfriend leaves her after learning she, Paige and Piper are actually witches; Richard tries to free himself of the family's karma.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Leo's mentor, Gideon, wants to find out who cast the spell of darkness over the school and conjured the headless horseman who has been beheading the teachers; Phoebe goes on a vision quest.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The charmed ones get wishful when a genie named Jinny is freed from her bottle by Phoebe, who is then tricked into taking her place.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary "Eggsy" Unwin (Taron Egerton), whose late father secretly worked for a spy organization, lives in a South London housing estate and seems headed for a life behind bars. However, dapper agent Harry Hart (Colin Firth) recognizes potential in the youth and recruits him to be a trainee in the secret service. Meanwhile, villainous Richmond Valentine (Samuel L. Jackson) launches a diabolical plan to solve the problem of climate change via a worldwide killing spree.

programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: Imbecilic best friends Lloyd Christmas (Jim Carrey) and Harry Dunne (Jeff Daniels) stumble across a suitcase full of money left behind in Harry's car by Mary Swanson (Lauren Holly), who was on her way to the airport. The pair decide to go to Aspen, Colo., to return the money, unaware that it is connected to a kidnapping. As Harry and Lloyd -- who has fallen in love with Mary -- are pursued across the country by hired killers and police, they find both their friendship and their brains tested.

programme.title: Rush Hour
programme.desc: When a Chinese diplomat's daughter is kidnapped in Los Angeles, he calls in Hong Kong Detective Inspector Lee (Jackie Chan) to assist the FBI with the case. But the FBI doesn't want anything to do with Lee, and they dump him off on the LAPD, who assign wisecracking Detective James Carter (Chris Tucker) to watch over him. Although Lee and Carter can't stand each other, they choose to work together to solve the case on their own when they figure out they've been ditched by both the FBI and police.

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: After an explosion at the US Embassy in Hong Kong kills two customs agents investigating currency smuggling, Inspector Lee (Jackie Chan) and James Carter (Chris Tucker) search for the mastermind. Ricky Tan (John Lone), head of the Fu-Cang-Long Triad, sends out his minions to insure that Carter and Lee don't solve the case.

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: East meets West when the assassination of Ambassador Han leads to the reunion of Lee and Carter. In Paris, the pair must stay one step ahead of Chinese gangsters and Lee's childhood friend, as they track down an envelope containing the identity of a powerful crime lord.

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The investigation into an accidental death reopens when the victim's sister asserts she may have been murdered by members of a fraternity.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a black teen makes friends with his white peers, despite his family being a target of racism, he ends up a murder victim, and detectives must sift through a slew of suspects to find the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Rush and the team reopen the case of an optimistic young mill worker who was murdered in a town filled with despair.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Rush and Valens try to connect a murder from 1977 to a serial killer about to be released from prison on a legal technicality.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When decorated military officer Chris Vaughn returns to his hometown in the state of Washington to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed and the town's big business is now a seedy casino operated by one of his old schoolmates, Jay Hamilton. Aided by his loyal friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption, but, finding no help from the police, he must take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: Doug MacRay (Ben Affleck) leads a band of ruthless bank robbers and has no real attachments except for James (Jeremy Renner), who -- despite his dangerous temper -- is like a brother. Everything changes for Doug when James briefly takes a hostage, bank employee Claire Keesey. Learning that she lives in the gang's neighborhood, Doug seeks her out to discover what she knows, and he falls in love. As the romance deepens, he wants out of his criminal life, but that could threaten Claire.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Figuring they're all expendable, a U.S. intelligence officer decides to assemble a team of dangerous, incarcerated supervillains for a top-secret mission. Now armed with government weapons, Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Captain Boomerang, Killer Croc and other despicable inmates must learn to work together. Dubbed Task Force X, the criminals unite to battle a mysterious and powerful entity, while the diabolical Joker launches an evil agenda of his own.

When Thanos arrives from outer space and threatens to destroy Earth, the Black Panther leaps into action and defeats him with the help of Earth's Mightiest Heroes. Can the Panther pounce on their perilous plan before Wakanda is pulverized?

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something…one of the Magic Books! It's “The Book of Deception.” They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover

programme.title: The Hundred Year Moon

programme.title: Fish Story!

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. programme.title: The Shatter Dragon
programme.desc: ThunderFang is freed, and only the Ninja stand between the Shatter Dragon of Chaos and his revenge.

programme.title: Prophecy Of The Green Ninja, Greatest Battles
programme.desc: So the final puzzle forces ninja to question the true meaning of the Green Ninja Prophecy. Solving the puzzles releases a new peril for the Ninja to face. Will memories of their greatest victories be enough to defeat it?

programme.title: The Power and the Peril!
programme.desc: Rock star mathematician Ian Malcolm returns to Isla Nublar and helps Claire, Owen and Hudson deal with strange power surges all over Jurassic World.

programme.title: Fistful of Doppelgangers
programme.desc: The Candy Realm is under siege, and the dream chasers are tasked with saving its sugary inhabitants. As they orchestrate a mass evacuation, Mateo and Astrid sneak into the Midnight Raven.

programme.title: Irrational Treasure
programme.desc: The elusive Eye of Confusion has been located, but the dream chasers are not alone in their pursuit. With the Never Witch's doppelgangers on their heels, the team embarks on a frantic treasure hunt.

programme.title: Mission Inplausible
programme.desc: As the Eye of Confusion's power threatens to unravel reality, Logan and Astrid are forced to confront their deepest fears in the Dream Forge.

programme.title: Music “Battle of the Stars”
programme.desc: Nova pulls off a series of pranks, leaving her friends scrambling and laughing. However, things take a dark turn when one of her pranks goes awry and sends the group into a terrifying situation.

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: Marvel Superheroes
programme.desc: Loki arrives at Avengers Tower declaring he wants to be an Avenger. Our heroes are skeptical, but Iron Man decides to make Loki an ”Avenger In Training”. It's a great plan until Thanos arrives on Earth looking for Loki

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap…is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous

programme.title: Gorilla's Gone Wild
programme.desc: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water and the Lions and Eagles must come to the rescue. The only problem is that the Lions don't like water ... at all!

programme.title: The Haunted and the Hunted!
programme.desc: Something mysterious lurking the jungle wrecks a construction site, and Hudson is convinced a ghost is responsible - but it might be something even more surprising.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: Sonic Underground

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A homecoming is interrupted for Sonic, Sonia and Manic when Sleet and Dingo arrive to collect back taxes after returning to their birthplace.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic loses his memory when Robotnik uses a hypnotic flower pollen on him, and tells him he's just an "ordinary" guy.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a Brain Evolution Achievement Negatizer, or B.E.A.N., in order to make all of Mobius stupid. But instead of turning Sonic and Tails into dummies, the BEAN device turns them into three year old babies!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic saves a damsel in distress, and falls in love with her, not knowing she's a robot built by Robotnik. But when she has a chance to trap him, she helps him escape, realizing she has fallen for him.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Tails invents a Hover-Hanglider for Sonic's birthday, Sonic suggests he assist Prof. Von Schlemmer with his new Robotnik-Nabber machine. Robotnik hears about this, and poses as Von Schlemmer to trick Tails into inventing a Sonic-Nabber instead.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Sonic rescues a village from a flash flood, he's left with the job of babysitting three baby Groundhogs.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik installs a new "obedience microchip" in Scratch and Grounder and orders them to drill for a rare mineral in a tropical mountain. With his Freezomatic machine, Robotnik covers the mountain in ice and runs a Hermit out of his home.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: In order to free Sketch Lampoon (a satirical comic book artist) from Robotnik's new high security prison, Sonic allows himself to be captured, then makes a high speed rescue and escape.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Scratch and Grounder fiddle with Robotnik's Warpinating Warpifier and send Sonic and Tails into the world of a Mobius Fairy Tales book.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: A female space hunter named Katella, who is capturing animals all over Mobius for a Zoo, teams up with Robotnik and captures Sonic. To Robotnik's great fear, she then plans to marry the eggman!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters, with new addition, Dulcy, develop a De-Roboti-sizer and try it out on Bunnie. It's a success and, against Sally's wishes, Sonic battles Robotnik's newest weapon, a Virtual Reality Shriek-Bot.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Antoine saves Sally's life during a raid, Sonic can't stand his bragging and zips in to see Uncle Chuck, who finds out his "bug" in Robotnik's HQ is malfunctioning.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his roboti-sizer system. While underground, Sonic spots his now roboti-sized Uncle Chuck aboard a Badlands bound mine-train and devises a plan for his rescue.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic is almost sucked inside the Void, he finds a huge Ring which Sally believes is an ancient relic but it turns out to be trick of the Sorcerer, Nagus. Sally and Bunnie are drawn inside the Void and when Sonic comes to rescue them.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic is hired into an obvious trap when a frustrated Robotnik decides to appeal to the Hedgehog's ego and announces a "race to determine the fastest on Mobius".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and The Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's underground air base in a mission to reprogram the launch data on Robotnik's fleet of Stealth-Bot aircraft. While attempting to reprogram the Stealth-Bot computer system.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Bob and the gang have got a big job on - repairing some pipework in Farmer Pickles field. / Bob, Scoop & Muck have to make repairs to a tunnel. When they arrive on site, Bob sends Muck ahead into the tunnel with a load of bricks.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters run into a Swashbuckler, named Ari, battling Swat-Bots. Sonic diverts them, allowing Ari to escape. After hearing that Robotnik is holding his band of Freedom Fighters hostage, Ari decides to help Sonic free them.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Tangled Webs The sinister Robotnik blackmails Cyrus, an old friend of Sonic's, by holding his father hostage.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Underground Masquerade Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Bug A group of Freedom Fighters is obliterated by a swarm of metallic fly-bots. When Manic goes looking for the insects, he is stung with serum.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Wedding Bell Blues Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia is invited to a debutante ball, but before she can be officially announced to society, she and her brothers, Manic and Sonic have an important mission.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik organizes a track meet to lure Sonic into a trap.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs congregate on the Floating Island in their latest effort to find their mother. But Sleet and Dingo also have an interest in this island.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic and Tails help out an Owl/Chilidog Diner owner, named Bert Whoo, when Robotnik uses his henchbots to try to collect protection money. When the henchbots prove to be no match for Sonic.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a Brain Evolution Achievement Negatizer, or B.E.A.N., in order to make all of Mobius stupid. But instead of turning Sonic and Tails into dummies, the BEAN device turns them into three year old babies!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik goes back to medieval times, and enlists the help of Merlink the Magician to get his gemstone.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When an undersea world is threatened by Captain Memo and his lobster sub, Sonic spreads a rumor that Memo plans to attack Robotnik next.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Tails gets trapped in the "Warp of Confusion" (an Escher-like world of another dimension) by Robotnik's cousin, Dr. Warpnik, Sonic comes to the rescue and traps Robotnik and his badniks in the warp.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic turns detective to solve the mystery of his missing Red Sneakers--and just in time to get them back and stop Dr. Robotnik's latest attack on a peaceful Mobius village.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic leaves Tails in charge of protecting a squirrel village food supply, when he zips off to stop a dam from breaking. Robotnik sends Scratch and Grounder after Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sir Hefty: Sir Hefty discovers a wayward knight to help him defeat a dragon whose fire is threatening to destroy the forest. Alas, the knight proves to be a coward, leaving Hefty to prove just how brave he is when he sends the dragon away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Poet And Painter: Because they feel unappreciated, Poet and Painter leave Smurf Village and head for Storm Island, totally unaware that Gargamel is planning to trap them. Papa Smurf and his faithful volunteers rescue their friends.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Good, The Bad And The Smurfy: King Argon is a burly, boorish brute, but his wizard Mordain is worse still. He plans to use several Smurfs he has captured to steal all of the King's gold...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Couldn't Say No: Being asked to go to the Marsh to bring back the rare Foxfire is a great honor for a Smurf. But Scaredy Smurf is reluctant to confront the Marsh Monster so he sends the Smurf who cannot say no.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: The First Telesmurf
programme.desc: Papa Smurf pours a magic potion over the new Smurf-melon patch, which instantly grows and grows all over the village and forest. The Smurfs use the blossoms as a telephone, but before Gargamel can trace their voices, the flowers turn into melons and telesmurf is no more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hats Off To Smurf: In his search for something new, Vanity dons a Gargamel-made magic hat that transforms his face into a mess. Through trickery, Papa Smurf gets the antidote from the wicked wizard and once more, Vanity is beautiful.

programme.title: No Time For Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy, Brainy, Clumsy, and Smurfette discover the hourglass of time in a cave and due to their bungling, time spins erratically out of control for all of the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Chief Record Smurf: Due to a wild experiment Clumsy is able to store endless knowledge into his memory. Gargamel captures him, trying to unlock Papa Smurf's invisibility formula, but at the last minute, Clumsy tricks him with the wrong ingredients.

programme.title: Good Neighbour Smurf
programme.desc: When Brainy's house burns down, he moves in with his fellow Smurfs and one by one they kick him out because of his meddling.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Little Smurf Confidence: Papa Smurf gives Weakling a special cream to wear that will restore his strength. Shortly after, he is awarded for his daring deeds of strength and his confidence really soars when he realizes the cream is smurfberry jam.

programme.title: Harmony Steals The Show
programme.desc: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hogatha's Hearththrob: Hogatha the witch promises Gargamel a magical whistle if he will introduce her to the warlock of her dreams. But they are both deceived by each other's trickery: Gargamel dresses up as the warlock, and Hogatha's magical whistle is only a birdcall.

programme.title: A Bell For Azrael
programme.desc: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead the cat to the Smurfs. Papa Smurf outwits him with a counter-spell that leads the wizard to Big Mouth instead of the tasty Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette For A Day: Hefty dresses like Smurfette to lure an enamored gnome, Piltkin, away from the Smurf Village. They burrow underground and meet a female gnome who falls in love with Piltkin who then casts Smurfette aside for his new heartthrob.

programme.title: The Magic Earrings
programme.desc: Hogatha manages to obtain the magic golden earrings of Sonoria that will enable her to hear Smurfy voices from afar. Following Lazy's snores, she almost reaches the Smurf Village until Harmony's horn-blasts blow in her earrings and she flies home in a rage.

programme.title: Gargamel's Last Will
programme.desc: Scruple, apprentice to the evil wizard Gargamel, is not above playing a trick or two on his master. When he learns that Puppy, the dog that belongs to the Smurfs, bit Gargamel, Scruple tells the wizard that by midnight, he'll have changed into a dog....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Dancing Bear: When his bear runs away from his fairground show, the gruff, uncouth Malakoff thinks he's out of business. But he's able to catch a much better show: the Smurflings. Can Brainy and Wild Smurf find a way to bring back the runaway bear?

programme.title: Smurfing The Unicorns
programme.desc: When Puppy, the Smurfs' well-loved dog, drinks tainted water and becomes very sick, Papa Smurf says there is only one chance to save him – but what is needed is the touch of a unicorn's horn. Can the Smurfs find it?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Nobody Smurf: Nobody Smurf is the Smurf that everybody always forgets. He'd like to develop a personality, get some sort of recognition from his peers, but he fails miserably. Must he remain forever the one that is overlooked? Or will he find his true personality?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Three Smurfketeers: In another Smurf theatrical super-production based – very loosely – on Alexandre Dumas' characters, a masterpiece of the stage is created, with a few lines from Romeo and Juliet thrown in.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Once In A Blue Moon: Once in a blue moon, as the legend goes, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs and everyone in the village becomes attached to the new arrival. But a mistake has been made and the stork returns to take the baby back. Grouchy and Smurfette have become so attached to the baby that the baby is returned.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Supersmurf: Bigmouth steals the Smurfs' winter food supply and Brainy concocts one of Papa Smurf's magic strength potions so he can fight the greedy giant. The super formula wears off, but Papa Smurf works a fast switch, replacing the food with rocks and Bigmouth is none the wiser.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fake Smurf: Hogatha turns herself into a Smurf, plotting revenge on the little people for destroying her magic locket. Papa Smurf outwits her and banishes her from the forest once more.

programme.title: The Baby Smurf
programme.desc: Gargamel turns himself into a Baby Smurf, to be adopted by the Smurfette. He causes complete chaos in the Smurf Village when he tries to blow it up with a time bomb! Papa Smurf discovers his evil plot and uses the explosive to send the wizard back to his dismal castle.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Haunted Smurf: The Smurfs' winter food supply is destroyed and they journey to a distant castle in search of shelter. Initially, they think the castle is haunted, but after they solve the mystery of a greedy pack of rats, the grateful owner presents them with an abundance of food for their long winter.

programme.title: The Purple Smurfs
programme.desc: The purple fly bites Lazy and an epidemic starts that turns the little villagers into angry, purple Smurfs. Papa Smurf discovers that the pollen from a tuberose flower is an antidote and soon things are smurfy again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Magnifying Mixture: Brainy makes an enlarging potion that turns Hefty into human size. The big-little strong man captures Gargamel and brings him back to the Smurf Village where Papa Smurf magically causes Azrael to chase his master back to his dreary castle.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Now You Smurf 'Em, Now You Don't: The underground trolls who want them to be their slaves capture the Smurfs. Papa Smurf ingeniously frees them and then destroys the trolls' magic crystal ball that gives them power over the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel The Generous: In an effort to find out where the Smurfs' secret diamond stash is hidden, Gargamel pretends to be their friend. When he shows his true, wicked self, Papa Smurf works a magic spell to save his little Smurfs from the vicious clutches of the evil wizard.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Paradise Smurfed: Lazy dreams he is on Paradise Island and free from all the work Papa Smurf inflicts on him. His fantasy turns into a nightmare that sends him eagerly back to work once more.

programme.title: The Abominable Snowbeast
programme.desc: Brainy and his friends organize a journey to Ice Mountain to pick the rare snow flower for Papa Smurf. They meet a terrifying snow beast that befriends them, due to Smurfette's kindness, and helps them find the tiny flower.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sister Smurf: Smurfette has found a new friend, Laura, a six-year-old child whose parents live near the forest. Together, the two girls wander in the forest. But an old witch who lives in the forest catches them.

programme.title: Gormandizing Greedy
programme.desc: Greedy overdoes it. He's getting heavier and heavier until his weight puts him in jeopardy. The evil Gargamel is going to catch him... Can Greedy be saved by Papa Smurf?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Dancing Shoes: An evil imp gives Smurfette dancing shoes and then tricks her into promising to marry him. All her little friends rush to her rescue and Papa Smurf magically puts the dancing shoes on the imp. He is forced to dance off into the night.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sir Hefty: Sir Hefty discovers a wayward knight to help him defeat a dragon whose fire is threatening to destroy the forest. Alas, the knight proves to be a coward, leaving Hefty to prove just how brave he is when he sends the dragon away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Poet And Painter: Because they feel unappreciated, Poet and Painter leave Smurf Village and head for Storm Island, totally unaware that Gargamel is planning to trap them. Papa Smurf and his faithful volunteers rescue their friends.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Good, The Bad And The Smurfy: King Argon is a burly, boorish brute, but his wizard Mordain is worse still. He plans to use several Smurfs he has captured to steal all of the King's gold...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Couldn't Say No: Being asked to go to the Marsh to bring back the rare Foxfire is a great honor for a Smurf. But Scaredy Smurf is reluctant to confront the Marsh Monster so he sends the Smurf who cannot say no.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: The First Telesmurf
programme.desc: Papa Smurf pours a magic potion over the new Smurf-melon patch, which instantly grows and grows all over the village and forest. The Smurfs use the blossoms as a telephone, but before Gargamel can trace their voices, the flowers turn into melons and telesmurf is no more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hats Off To Smurf: In his search for something new, Vanity dons a Gargamel-made magic hat that transforms his face into a mess. Through trickery, Papa Smurf gets the antidote from the wicked wizard and once more, Vanity is beautiful.

programme.title: No Time For Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy, Brainy, Clumsy, and Smurfette discover the hourglass of time in a cave and due to their bungling, time spins erratically out of control for all of the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Chief Record Smurf: Due to a wild experiment Clumsy is able to store endless knowledge into his memory. Gargamel captures him, trying to unlock Papa Smurf's invisibility formula, but at the last minute, Clumsy tricks him with the wrong ingredients.

programme.title: Good Neighbour Smurf
programme.desc: When Brainy's house burns down, he moves in with his fellow Smurfs and one by one they kick him out because of his meddling.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Little Smurf Confidence: Papa Smurf gives Weakling a special cream to wear that will restore his strength. Shortly after, he is awarded for his daring deeds of strength and his confidence really soars when he realizes the cream is smurfberry jam.

programme.title: Harmony Steals The Show
programme.desc: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hogatha's Hearththrob: Hogatha the witch promises Gargamel a magical whistle if he will introduce her to the warlock of her dreams. But they are both deceived by each other's trickery: Gargamel dresses up as the warlock, and Hogatha's magical whistle is only a birdcall.

programme.title: A Bell For Azrael
programme.desc: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead the cat to the Smurfs. Papa Smurf outwits him with a counter-spell that leads the wizard to Big Mouth instead of the tasty Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette For A Day: Hefty dresses like Smurfette to lure an enamored gnome, Piltkin, away from the Smurf Village. They burrow underground and meet a female gnome who falls in love with Piltkin who then casts Smurfette aside for his new heartthrob.

programme.title: The Magic Earrings
programme.desc: Hogatha manages to obtain the magic golden earrings of Sonoria that will enable her to hear Smurfy voices from afar. Following Lazy's snores, she almost reaches the Smurf Village until Harmony's horn-blasts blow in her earrings and she flies home in a rage.

programme.title: Gargamel's Last Will
programme.desc: Scruple, apprentice to the evil wizard Gargamel, is not above playing a trick or two on his master. When he learns that Puppy, the dog that belongs to the Smurfs, bit Gargamel, Scruple tells the wizard that by midnight, he'll have changed into a dog....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Dancing Bear: When his bear runs away from his fairground show, the gruff, uncouth Malakoff thinks he's out of business. But he's able to catch a much better show: the Smurflings. Can Brainy and Wild Smurf find a way to bring back the runaway bear?

programme.title: Smurfing The Unicorns
programme.desc: When Puppy, the Smurfs' well-loved dog, drinks tainted water and becomes very sick, Papa Smurf says there is only one chance to save him – but what is needed is the touch of a unicorn's horn. Can the Smurfs find it?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Nobody Smurf: Nobody Smurf is the Smurf that everybody always forgets. He'd like to develop a personality, get some sort of recognition from his peers, but he fails miserably. Must he remain forever the one that is overlooked? Or will he find his true personality?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Three Smurfketeers: In another Smurf theatrical super-production based – very loosely – on Alexandre Dumas' characters, a masterpiece of the stage is created, with a few lines from Romeo and Juliet thrown in.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.
